titles.title: Bovine Growth Hormone Milk Labeling Act
A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act with respect to the labeling of milk and milk products, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4323-4326)

bill.summary: 4/1/1993--Introduced. Bovine Growth Hormone Milk Labeling Act - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require that all milk and milk products labels indicate whether or not the product is derived from cows injected with bovine growth hormone. Sets forth related bovine growth hormone recordkeeping requirements.
